name: The Closure
storyline: This mod starts where the original Half-Life 2: Episode 2 ended, with the death of Eli Vance. Alyx Vance, the daughter of Eli, became sick by the loss of him and lays in bed. Magnusson needs Gordon to look for Kleiner, because he disappeared. The last time he saw Kleiner was when he spoke about going to the Borealis to blow the ship and everything inside it up. Gordon needs to travel by airplane to the north pole and find Kleiner and save the ship. Will you be on time? And will you find out what the secret cargo is inside the ship?
summary:
The Closure (also known as Half-Life 2 Episode 3: The Closure) is a Mod for Half-Life 2, developed and published by SPY Interactive. This Mod acts as an unofficial sequel to Half-Life 2: Episode Two, starting after the death of Eli Vance.

The Mod received negative feedback due to the gameplay and design having very little to do with Half-Life and its extensive use of cutscenes.
